mapper.select: SELECT (select sum(zbsl) from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_LCJG_SYDW) AS jdwl, (select sum(zbsl) from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_LCJG_CYRY) AS cyry, (select count(1) from ods.ods_manu_smsj) AS smsj, (select sum(sl) from rpt.rpt_aqjg_jdwl_jcgtj where lxdm in ('11','12','21','22')) AS jcgs, (select sum(zbsl) from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_LCJG_SYDW where zrsqd='1') AS aqzrs, (select count(1) from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_DWJCXX WHERE JCLXDM = '1') AS cgjc, (select count(1) from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_DWJCXX WHERE JCLXDM = '2') AS zdjc, (select count(1) from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_DWJCXX WHERE JCLXDM = '3') AS zxjc, (select count(1) from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_YHMX WHERE jcd = '寄递业末端网点检查表' AND xxz = '否' AND jcxlx != '0') AS yhfx, (select count(1) from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_YHMX WHERE ((jclx IN ('1','2','3') AND clzt = '1') OR (jclx = '4' AND clzt = '3') OR (jclx = '4' AND clzt = '5') OR (jclx = '4' AND clzt = '6')) and jcd = '寄递业末端网点检查表' AND xxz = '否' AND jcxlx != '0') AS yhcl
select dwfl,dwflmc as name,sum(zbsl) as num from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_LCJG_SYDW where dwfl in ('0','1','2','3','4','5') group by 1,2
select rylb as name,sum(zbsl) AS num from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_LCJG_CYRY group by rylb
select jcxmc as name,count(jcxmc) as num from rpt.rpt_aqjg_jdwl_yhmx -- WHERE jcd = '寄递业末端网点检查表' AND xxz = '否' AND jcxlx != '0' GROUP BY jcxmc ORDER BY count(jcxmc) DESC

select xzqh,sum(zbsl) as num from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_LCJG_SYDW where 1=1
AND dwflmc IN
#{item}
group by 1

select xzqh,sum(zbsl) as num from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_LCJG_CYRY where 1=1
AND rylb IN
#{item}
group by xzqh
select COALESCE(sum(zbsl),0) as num from rpt."rpt_aqjg_jdwl_lcjg_sydw" where djrq like #{data} ||'%'
select COALESCE(sum(zbsl),0) as num from rpt."rpt_aqjg_jdwl_lcjg_sydw" where djrq = #{data}
select COALESCE(sum(zbsl),0) as num from rpt."rpt_aqjg_jdwl_lcjg_cyry" where djrq like #{data} ||'%'
select COALESCE(sum(zbsl),0) as num from rpt."rpt_aqjg_jdwl_lcjg_cyry" where djrq = #{data}
select xzqh,sum(zbsl) as num from rpt.rpt_aqjg_jdwl_lcjg_sydw where jbdj in('1','2','3') group by 1
select sum(zbsl) from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_LCJG_SYDW where jbdj in('1','2','3')
select xzqh,sum(zbsl) as num from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_LCJG_SYDW where zrsqd='1'and xzqh=#{xzqhs} group by 1
select sum(zbsl) from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_LCJG_SYDW where xzqh=#{xzqhs}
select COALESCE(sum(sl),0) from rpt.rpt_aqjg_jdwl_jcgtj where lxdm in ('12','22') and tjrq like #{data} ||'%'
select COALESCE(sum(sl),0) from rpt.rpt_aqjg_jdwl_jcgtj where lxdm in ('12','22') and tjrq = #{data}
select COALESCE(sum(sl),0) from rpt.rpt_aqjg_jdwl_jcgtj where lxdm in ('11','21') and tjrq = #{data}
select COALESCE(sum(sl),0) from rpt.rpt_aqjg_jdwl_jcgtj where lxdm in ('11','21') and tjrq like #{data} ||'%'
select COALESCE(sum(sl),0) from rpt.rpt_aqjg_jdwl_jcgtj where lxdm in ('12','22')
select COALESCE(sum(sl),0) from rpt.rpt_aqjg_jdwl_jcgtj where lxdm in ('11','21')
select sml from ods.ods_manu_smsj where riqi like #{data} ||'%'

select COALESCE(sum(yhsl),0) as num from rpt.rpt_aqjg_jdwl_yhmx WHERE 1=1 -- and jcd = '寄递业末端网点检查表' AND xxz = '否' AND jcxlx != '0' and tjrq like #{data} ||'%'
and fjmc =#{fjmc}

select COALESCE(sum(yhsl),0) from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_YHMX WHERE ((jclx IN ('1','2','3') AND clzt = '1') OR (jclx = '4' AND clzt = '3') OR (jclx = '4' AND clzt = '5') OR (jclx = '4' AND clzt = '6')) -- and jcd = '寄递业末端网点检查表' AND xxz = '否' AND jcxlx != '0' and tjrq like #{data} ||'%'
and fjmc =#{fjmc}
select fjmc,COALESCE(sum(yhsl),0) as num from rpt.rpt_aqjg_jdwl_yhmx WHERE 1=1 -- and jcd = '寄递业末端网点检查表' AND xxz = '否' AND jcxlx != '0' and fjmc = #{fjmc} group by 1

select fjmc,COALESCE(sum(yhsl),0) as num from rpt.RPT_AQJG_JDWL_YHMX WHERE ((jclx IN ('1','2','3') AND clzt = '1') OR (jclx = '4' AND clzt = '3') OR (jclx = '4' AND clzt = '5') OR (jclx = '4' AND clzt = '6')) -- and jcd = '寄递业末端网点检查表' AND xxz = '否' AND jcxlx != '0' and fjmc = #{fjmc} group by 1
